const CACHE_KEY = "EWCBrowserCacheKey";
const CACHE_VALUE = "EWCBrowserCacheValue"; 
const CACHE_EXPIRY = "EWCBrowserCacheExpiry"; 
var cache = config.flyout.cache();

const isCacheValid = function () {
  // Check for page types and tenure of the cache
  const clearCache = config.clearCache;
  const cacheExpiryTime = cache.getCache(CACHE_EXPIRY);
  const isCacheExpired = new Date() > new Date(cacheExpiryTime);
  const cacheKey = config.EWCBrowserCacheKey;
  const oldCacheKey = cache.getCache(CACHE_KEY);
  const isCacheValid = !clearCache && !isCacheExpired && cacheKey == oldCacheKey;
  if (!isCacheValid && window.ue && window.ue.count) {
    var current = window.ue.count("ewc-cache-invalidated") || 0;
    window.ue.count("ewc-cache-invalidated", current + 1);
  }
  return isCacheValid;
}
function loadFromCache() {
    if (window.uet && typeof window.uet === 'function') {
        window.uet('bb', 'ewc-loaded-from-cache', {wb: 1});
    }
    if (cache) {
        if (isCacheValid()) {
            var content = cache.getCache(CACHE_VALUE);
            if (content) {
                var $ewcContainer = document.getElementById("nav-flyout-ewc").getElementsByClassName("nav-ewc-content")[0];
                var $ewcContent = document.getElementById("ewc-content");
                if ($ewcContainer && !$ewcContent) {
                    $ewcContainer.innerHTML = content;
                    // Execute scripts from cache
                    const ewcJavascript = document.getElementById("ewc-content").parentNode.querySelectorAll(':scope > script');
                    ewcJavascript.forEach(function (script) {
                        var scriptTag = document.createElement("script");
                        scriptTag.innerHTML = script.innerHTML;
                        document.body.appendChild(scriptTag);
                    });
                    if (typeof window.uex === 'function') {
                        window.uex('ld', 'ewc-loaded-from-cache', {wb: 1});
                    }
                } else if (window.ue && window.ue.count && typeof window.ue.count === 'function') {
                    var currentFailure = window.ue.count("ewc-slow-cache") || 0;
                    window.ue.count("ewc-slow-cache", currentFailure + 1);
                }
            }
        } else {
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_VALUE);
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_KEY);
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_EXPIRY);
        }
    }
}

                        const wlpParams = {
                            clientId: "PrimeAcquisition",
                            ingressId: "DetailPage",
                            redirectURL: "L2RwL2dsYW5jZS9CMEYyNFlQTVpS",
                            primeCampaignId: ""
                        }

                        

                        P.when("sfx-injectable").execute("attach-wlp-signup", async (injectableAPI) => {
                            try {
                                // Get the specific WLP experience that is determined through wlpParams
                                let experienceUUID = injectableAPI.initiate(wlpParams, {});

                                // Add onclick event listener to display WLP widget when customer clicks the ABB CTA
                                const abbSignupCta = document.getElementById("prime-abb-signup-button");
                                abbSignupCta.onclick = () => {
                                    injectableAPI.show(experienceUUID);
                                }

                                // Handle SPACE key event for ABB CTA
                                if (abbSignupCta) {
                                    abbSignupCta.addEventListener('keydown', (event) => {
                                        if (event.keyCode === 32 || event.key === ' ') {
                                            event.preventDefault();
                                            abbSignupCta.click();
                                        }
                                    });
                                }

                                // In the case of a sign-in redirect, check URL "loadInjectable" query param for match with
                                // clientId + ingressId. If matching, display WLP popup. This is to match previous injectable
                                // behavior whereby when customer signs in from WLP, the popup would be displayed upon redirect
                                //
                                // Query param structure: loadInjectable=[clientId]_[ingressId]
                                const queryString = window.location.search;
                                const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
                                const loadInjectableIds = queryParams.get("loadInjectable");
                                if (loadInjectableIds && loadInjectableIds.includes('_')) {
                                    const [redirectClientId, redirectIngressId] = loadInjectableIds.split("_");
                                    if (redirectClientId === wlpParams.clientId && redirectIngressId === wlpParams.ingressId) {
                                        injectableAPI.show(experienceUUID);
                                    }
                                }
                            } catch (error) {
                                console.error('PrimeABB error invoking WLP:', error);
                            }
                        })

    if (isPriceInsightsDesktopEnabled) {
        A.declarative('show-rufus-price-ingress', 'click', function(event){
            event.$event.preventDefault();
            if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
                window.ue.count("priceInsightsFODCX:desktop:click", 1);
            }

            if (uet) {
                uet('bb', "priceInsightsFODCX:desktop:clickAction:latency", {wb: 1});
            }

            let fodCxElement = document.getElementById("fod-cx-box");
            let ingressQueryText = (fodCxElement && fodCxElement.getAttribute("data-query-text")) || "Why does this say 'High Price'?";
            let csaElement = (window.csa && fodCxElement) ? window.csa('Content', {element: fodCxElement}) : undefined;

            if(csaElement) {
                csaElement(
                    'mark',
                    'render-start',
                    performance.now()
                );
            }

            window.P.when('rufus-handle-stream').execute(
                function (stream) {
                    if (stream) {
                        ue && ue.count && ue.count("RUFUS_DPX_ATF_PRICE_HISTORY_SENT_TO_RUFUS_DESKTOP_FODCX", 1);
                        stream({
                            qis: 'NileDPApexPriceHistory',
                            query: ingressQueryText,
                            metricName: 'DesktopPriceHistoryDPXIngress'
                        });
                    }
                }
            );

            if (uex) {
                uex('ld', "priceInsightsFODCX:desktop:clickAction:latency", {wb: 1} );
            }

            if(csaElement) {
                csaElement(
                    'mark',
                    'render-end',
                    performance.now()
                );
            }
        });
    }
  });
</script>

    P.when("A", "load").execute("aod-assets-loaded", function(A){
        function logAssetsNotLoaded() {
            if (window.ueLogError) {
                var customError = { message: 'Failed to load AOD assets for WDG: toy_display_on_website, Device: web' };
                var additionalInfo = {
                    logLevel : 'ERROR',
                    attribution : 'aod_assets_not_loaded'
                };
                ueLogError (customError, additionalInfo);
            }
            if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
                window.ue.count("aod-assets-not-loaded", 1);
            }
        }

        function verifyAssetsLoaded() {
            var assetsLoadedPageState = A.state('aod:assetsLoaded');
            var logAssetsNotLoadedState = A.state('aod:logAssetsNotLoaded');

            if((assetsLoadedPageState == null || !assetsLoadedPageState.isAodAssetsLoaded)
                && (logAssetsNotLoadedState == null || !logAssetsNotLoadedState.isAodAssetsNotLoadedLogged)) {
                A.state('aod:logAssetsNotLoaded', {isAodAssetsNotLoadedLogged: true});
                logAssetsNotLoaded();
            }
        }

        setTimeout(verifyAssetsLoaded, 50000)
    });
</script>                                      </div>

     <script type="text/javascript">
    P.now('A').execute("MediaBlockSlotResponsiveness", function(A){
        var contentLoadedMarkerPerIndex = {};
        var slotLoadedMarkerPerIndex = {};
        var mediaBlockPrimaryView = document.getElementById("imageBlock");
        var primaryViewSlotSelectorPrefix = ".desktop-media-mainView .item.itemNo";

        function isContentLoadedMarkedForIndex(slotIndex) {
            let isSlotIndexMarked = true;
            if (!contentLoadedMarkerPerIndex[slotIndex]) {
                isSlotIndexMarked = false;
                contentLoadedMarkerPerIndex[slotIndex] = true;
            }
            return isSlotIndexMarked;
        }

        function isSlotLoadedMarkedForIndex(slotIndex) {
            let isSlotIndexMarked = true;
            if (!slotLoadedMarkerPerIndex[slotIndex]) {
                isSlotIndexMarked = false;
                slotLoadedMarkerPerIndex[slotIndex] = true;
            }
            return isSlotIndexMarked;
        }

        function getSlotElementOfIndex(slotIndex) {
            return mediaBlockPrimaryView.querySelector(primaryViewSlotSelectorPrefix + slotIndex);
        }

        function isSlotIndexValid(slotIndex) {
            return typeof slotIndex === 'number' && Number.isInteger(slotIndex) && slotIndex >= 0;
        }

        window.logContentLoadedMarker = function(slotIndex){
            if(!isSlotIndexValid(slotIndex)) return;

            // Return if slotIndex is already marked
            if(isContentLoadedMarkedForIndex(slotIndex)) return;

            // Get the slot element of the primaryView using slotIndex
            let slotElement = getSlotElementOfIndex(slotIndex);

            // Log the contentLoaded marker
            if (window.csa) {
                let csaElement = window.csa("Content", {
                    element: slotElement
                });
                csaElement("mark", "contentLoaded");
            }
        }

        window.logSlotLoadedMarker = function (slotIndex) {
            if(!isSlotIndexValid(slotIndex)) return;

            // Return if slotIndex is already marked
            if(isSlotLoadedMarkedForIndex(slotIndex)) return;

            //Get the slot element of the primaryView using slotIndex
            let slotElement = getSlotElementOfIndex(slotIndex);

            // Log the slotLoaded marker
            if (window.csa) {
                let csaElement = window.csa("Content", {
                    element: slotElement
                });
                csaElement("mark", "slotLoaded");
            }
        }
    });
</script>

    var mainImgContainer = document.getElementById("main-image-container");
    var landingImage = document.getElementById("landingImage");
    var imgWrapperDiv = document.getElementById("imgTagWrapperId");
    
    var containerWidth = mainImgContainer.offsetWidth;
    var holderRatio = 1.0;
    var containerHeight = containerWidth/holderRatio;
    containerHeight = Math.min(containerHeight, 700);

    var dynamicImageMaxHeight = 599 ;
    var dynamicImageMaxWidth = 679 ;
    
        if (landingImage) {
            dynamicImageMaxHeight = landingImage.naturalHeight;
            dynamicImageMaxWidth = landingImage.naturalWidth;
        }
    
    var aspectRatio = dynamicImageMaxWidth/dynamicImageMaxHeight;

    var imageMaxHeight = containerHeight;
    var imageMaxWidth = containerWidth;

    if(!true) {
        imageMaxHeight = Math.min(imageMaxHeight, dynamicImageMaxHeight);
        imageMaxWidth = Math.min(imageMaxWidth, dynamicImageMaxWidth);
    }

    
    var useImageBlockLeftColCentering = false;
    var rightMargin = 40;

    if(typeof useImageBlockLeftColCentering !== "undefined" && useImageBlockLeftColCentering){
        mainImgContainer.style.marginRight = rightMargin + "px";
    }
    mainImgContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";

    var imageMaxWidthBasedOnHeight = imageMaxHeight * aspectRatio;
    var imageMaxHeightBasedOnWidth = imageMaxWidth / aspectRatio;
    imageMaxHeight = Math.min(imageMaxHeight, imageMaxHeightBasedOnWidth);
    imageMaxWidth = Math.min(imageMaxWidth, imageMaxWidthBasedOnHeight);

    if(imgWrapperDiv){
        imgWrapperDiv.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
    }

    if(landingImage){
        landingImage.style.maxHeight = imageMaxHeight + "px";
        landingImage.style.maxWidth = imageMaxWidth + "px";
    }

    // log first slot render marker
    if(window.logSlotLoadedMarker) {
        logSlotLoadedMarker(0);
    }

P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function(A, jQuery) {
    
    //Page load metrics
    emitPageLoadMetrics();

    //Desktop hover metrics
    A.declarative.create(jQuery("#InstallmentCalculatorTrigger"), "installmentCalculatorTriggerAction");
    A.declarative('installmentCalculatorTriggerAction', "mouseenter", function(event) {
        logEvent("DPIC_DESKTOP_GLANCE_VIEW_HOVERED")
        checkAndLogMarketingEvent("DPIC_DESKTOP_MARKETING_IMAGE_SHOWN")
        publishNexusEventOnHover(true)
    });

    //Mobile hover metrics
    A.declarative.create(jQuery("#trigger_installmentCalculator"), "installmentCalculatorTriggerAction");
    A.declarative('installmentCalculatorTriggerAction', "touchstart", function(event) {
        logEvent("DPIC_MOBILE_GLANCE_VIEW_HOVERED")
        checkAndLogMarketingEvent("DPIC_MOBILE_MARKETING_IMAGE_SHOWN")
        publishNexusEventOnHover(false)
    });

    function checkAndLogMarketingEvent(event) {
        var marketingWidgetUrl = jQuery("#marketing-widget-url");
        if(marketingWidgetUrl != null && marketingWidgetUrl.length > 0) {
            logEvent(event)
        }
    }

    // Log events to CSM
    function logEvent(event, count) {
        var ue = window.ue;
        if (count === null || isNaN(count)) {
            count = 1;
        }
        event = event.replace(/\s/g,"");
        if (ue && ue.count) {
            ue.count(event, count);
        }
    }

    function emitPageLoadMetrics() {
        var pageLoadMetrics = A.state("pageLoadMetrics");
        if (pageLoadMetrics && pageLoadMetrics.flag) {
            let bestOfferStringId = '';
            const bestOfferElement = document.querySelector('[id^="best-offer-string-"]');
            if (bestOfferElement) {
                bestOfferStringId = bestOfferElement.id;
                if(document.getElementById('best-offer-recommended-tag')) {
                    bestOfferStringId += '-recommended-tag';
                }
            }
            let isDesktop = pageLoadMetrics.deviceType === 'Desktop';
            publishNexusEventOnPageLoad(isDesktop, bestOfferStringId);
        }
    }
    
    // Function to log CSA Event to Nexus on page load
    function publishNexusEventOnPageLoad(isDesktop, bestOfferStringId) {
        var installmentCalculatorNexusSchema = A.state("installmentCalculatorNexusSchema");
        if(installmentCalculatorNexusSchema && window.csa) {
            publishNexusEventHelper(installmentCalculatorNexusSchema, bestOfferStringId, isDesktop);
        }
    }

    // Function to log CSA Event to Nexus on Hover
    function publishNexusEventOnHover(isDesktop) {
        var installmentCalculatorNexusSchema = A.state("installmentCalculatorNexusSchema");
        if(installmentCalculatorNexusSchema && window.csa) {
            //Refer: https://info.analytics.a2z.com/#/docs/data_collection/csa/publish_custom_metrics
            var messageId = 'initial-active-tab-' + installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.initialActiveTab;
            if(document.getElementById('tab-recommended-tag')) {
                messageId += '-recommended-tag';
            }
            publishNexusEventHelper(installmentCalculatorNexusSchema, messageId, isDesktop);
            
        }
    }

    function publishNexusEventHelper(installmentCalculatorNexusSchema, messageId, isDesktop){
        var dpicWidgetEvents = window.csa("Events", {producerId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.producerId});
        dpicWidgetEvents("log", {
                schemaId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.schemaId,
                sellerId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.sellerId,
                asin: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.asin,
                customerId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.customerId,
                sessionId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.sessionId,
                isDesktop: isDesktop,
                requestId: installmentCalculatorNexusSchema.requestId,
                messageId: messageId
            });
    }
});

        <div class="a-section policy">  <h4>Alimentos e Bebidas</h4> <h5 class="secondary-header a-text-normal">Devolu├º├úo em at├⌐ 7 dias</h5>   <span><p>A devolu├º├úo de bebidas e alimentos enviadas pela Amazon.com.br deve ser solicitada no prazo de at├⌐ sete dias ap├│s o recebimento do pedido.</p>
